question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. person in white shirt
B. refrigerator with drinks
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The sandwich and plate are in the foreground, while the person in the white shirt is in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious without needing a depth map.
